1.0.name: wordpress/obfuscator
1.0.description:
This plugin will allow you to display Tor bridge information on your blog.

The intent is to let your readers find bridge IP information without the addresses being grabbed by censoring governments and filtered. The hope is that many people will run this plugin and make it impossible (or just very hard) for Tor bridge information to be filtered, but still allow that information to be available to large groups of people.

You can aggregate the bridge information from the main Tor site, or from an RSS feed. This is configurable per widget.

You can display the bridge information with shortcodes, or widgets. You can change the display size and location of the shortcode and of the individual widgets.
